Blind River.title: Blind River
Blind River.byline: Blind River (population 3,400 in 2021) is a small town in Northern Ontario, midway between Sault Ste Marie and Sudbury on the Trans-Canada Highway, which serves as a rest stop with sandy beaches, campgrounds and a championship golf course.

Bliss State Park.title: Bliss State Park
Bliss State Park.byline: D. L. Bliss State Park is near Lake Tahoe, in the Sierra Nevada region of California.

Blitar.title: Blitar
Blitar.byline: Blitar is a regency in East Java.
